example.name: layer-lhrh2
example.description: Example of a layer which starts out in one staff and then changes to another in a measure. Example from Beethoven's piano sonata no. 2 in A major, op. 2, no. 2, mvmt. 4: Rondo: Grazioso.

file.name: lhrh2.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: lhrh2.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
